Module AdrenalinaGame

Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServerFunctionalities  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LobbyController
    Handles incoming players and put them in the lobby
    LoginHandler
    Handles incoming connection from both rmi and socket registering the new client accordingly
    MatchController  
    PlayerConnection
    Allows server to send request to client without knowing connection method
    PlayerRemote
    RMI implementation of player connection calls clientPlayer methods directly
    PlayerSocket
    Socket implementation of PlayerConnection Builds a JSON formatted string with instructions for client which executes ClientPlayer functions and responds with json formatted string
    Turn
    Singleton Turn class
    WeaponSelection
    Manages communications about shoot/reload weapon selections

    Enum Description
    TurnAction
